message:
### Error querying database.  Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'UUID' in 'field list'
### The error may exist in file [D:\chrome下载地址\SpringBootDemo-master\SpringBootDemo-master\springboot-dubbo\dubbo-provider\target\classes\mappers\userDao.xml]
### The error may involve com.dubbo.provider.dao.UserDao.getUserById-Inline
### The error occurred while setting parameters
### SQL: select UUID,name,sex from student where id=?;
### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'UUID' in 'field list'
; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'UUID' in 'field list'
